fields.headline: What's new?
fields.bodyText: Ski into April Neilson (0870 333 3347; neilson.com) has extended the ski season following phenomenal snowfall in the Alps and following high demand for Easter breaks. It has added an extra flight into Lyon from 26 March until 9 April, a week later than planned. Packages to Tignes cost from £385pp with flights from Gatwick and accommodation. Get high in Holland Visitors to Rotterdam can sleep with their heads in the clouds in two luxury retro-style suites 100 metres high at the top of the Euromast tower. The Heaven and Stars suites cost from £260 a night. Contact Euromast (00 31 102 411 788; euromast.nl). Flights with Transavia (020 7365 4997; transavia.com) from £62.52 return. Aspiring hotel Shangri-La (shangri-la.com) is to open a hotel inside the spire of the planned new London Bridge Tower in 2009. Chien reaction Take your 'best friend' hiking with Headwater's Pet Travel Scheme (01606 720199; headwater.com). French holidays have been adapted to accommodate dogs, including trips in the Haut Jura and doggy paddling in the Dordogne. Go with the flow Baltic Holidays (0870 757 9233; balticholidays.com) offers free colonic irrigation to anyone booking a trip to the spa resort Druskininkai in Lithuania. The cost of the trip is £532 a week B&B including Gatwick flights and three nights in Vilnius.
